summary: Grafana account takeover via OAuth vulnerability in github.com/grafana/grafana
details:
Grafana account takeover via OAuth vulnerability in github.com/grafana/grafana.

NOTE: The source advisory for this report contains additional versions that could not be automatically mapped to standard Go module versions.

(If this is causing false-positive reports from vulnerability scanners, please suggest an edit to the report.)

The additional affected modules and versions are: github.com/grafana/grafana from v5.3.0 before v8.3.10, from v8.4.0 before v8.4.10, from v8.5.0 before v8.5.9, from v9.0.0 before v9.0.3.
